creditline: Gift of Elizabeth, Julie, and Catherine Andrus in memory of John and Marion Andrus
description: outline image of female figure, low to the ground, bending to cradle the head of a standing child
inscription:
Signature

in graphite on verso: APG 12872 | 913662 | 10/
provenance: [C. & J. Goodfriend, New York; sold December 8, 1993, to Andrus]; John E. Andrus III, Wayzata, Minn.; by descent to his daughters, Elizabeth, Katie, and Julie; gave to MIA, 2015. Earlier provenances have been gathered, but further research will increase our knowledge of their histories.
signed: signed in graphite, below image, lower right: [fvallotton]; initialed in block at lower left: [FV]
title: Bather with a Child, From Little Bathers, Plate 9
